channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: FAA finds safety concerns at Las Vegas airport in review spurred by midair collision in Washington
item.description: A federal review of helicopter safety around some of the busiest U.S. airports has revealed dangerous flying conditions at the Las Vegas airport.

item.title: Orders to leave the country — some for US citizen — sow confusion among immigrants
Immigrants in the US unlawfully can drive legally in 19 states. Now some states want to stop them
